name: Bass Rhythm
description:
Warning: WebGL version of my game doesn't support some of the Unity's audio mixing features. So bass boost will not work, sorry.

If you successfully key press 7 times when the note hits the green block,
the note goes deeper and music gets bass-ier.

S is the key to press!

This is just proof of concept.

If you like it, I will work more on it!
